description: Dennis West’s nephew has graduated and is headed to college. As a present, Dennis offers to buy him a car but only if he hooks his favorite uncle up with some of his hot friends. Dennis just wants a piece of young fresh teenage ass and cock, and he knows his nephew is the ticket. Scott Riley comes by offering to do some work in exchange for cash, and Dennis shows him just what kind of work he needs done.
title: Dirty Uncle Dennis Part 1
